verses.verse: He <S%G2532>showed<s%> <S%G1166>me<s%> <S%G3427>a<s%> <S%G2513>river<s%> of water <S%G4215>of<s%> <S%G5204>life<s%> <S%G2222><s%>, clear <S%G2986>as<s%> <S%G5613>crystal<s%> <S%G2930><s%>, proceeding out of <S%G1607>the<s%> throne <S%G1537>of<s%> God <S%G2362>and<s%> of <S%G2316>the<s%> <S%G2532>Lamb<s%> <S%G721><s%>,

in the middle <S%G1722>of<s%> <S%G3319>its<s%> <S%G846>street<s%> <S%G4113><s%>. On this <S%G2532>side<s%> of <S%G2532>the<s%> <S%G1782>river<s%> <S%G4215>and<s%> on that <S%G2532>was<s%> the tree <S%G1782>of<s%> <S%G3586>life<s%> <S%G2222><s%>, bearing twelve kinds <S%G4160>of<s%> <S%G1427>fruits<s%> <S%G2590><s%>, yielding <S%G591>its<s%> <S%G846>fruit<s%> <S%G2590><s%> <S%G1520><s%> <S%G2596>every<s%> <S%G1538><s%> <S%G3376>month.<s%> The leaves of the tree <S%G5444>were<s%> for <S%G3586>the<s%> healing <S%G1519>of<s%> the <S%G2322>nations<s%> <S%G1484><s%>.

There will <S%G2532>be<s%> <S%G2071>no<s%> <S%G3756>curse<s%> <S%G2652>any<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G2532><s%> <S%G2089>more.<s%> The throne of God <S%G2362>and<s%> of <S%G2316>the<s%> Lamb <S%G2532>will<s%> <S%G721>be<s%> <S%G2071>in<s%> <S%G1722>it<s%> <S%G846><s%>, and <S%G2532>his<s%> <S%G846>servants<s%> <S%G1401>serve<s%> <S%G3000>him<s%> <S%G846><s%>.
They will <S%G2532>see<s%> <S%G3700>his<s%> <S%G846>face<s%> <S%G4383><s%>, and <S%G2532>his<s%> name will <S%G846>be<s%> <S%G3686>on<s%> <S%G1909>their<s%> <S%G846>foreheads<s%> <S%G3359><s%>.

<S%G2532>There<s%> will <S%G1563>be<s%> <S%G2071>no<s%> <S%G3756>night<s%> <S%G3571><s%>, and <S%G2532>they<s%> <S%G2192>need<s%> <S%G5532>no<s%> <S%G3756>lamp<s%> <S%G3088>light<s%> <S%G2532><s%>; <S%G5457><s%> <S%G2246><s%> for the <S%G3754>Lord<s%> <S%G2962>God<s%> will <S%G2316>illuminate<s%> <S%G5461>them<s%> <S%G846><s%>. They will <S%G2532>reign<s%> <S%G936><s%> <S%G1519><s%> forever and <S%G165>ever<s%> <S%G165><s%>.

He said <S%G2532>to<s%> <S%G2036>me<s%> <S%G3427><s%>, "These <S%G3778>words<s%> are <S%G3056>faithful<s%> <S%G4103>and<s%> <S%G2532>true<s%> <S%G228><s%>. The Lord <S%G2532>God<s%> of <S%G2962>the<s%> spirits of the <S%G2316%G99999>prophets<s%> <S%G4396>sent<s%> <S%G649>his<s%> <S%G846>angel<s%> to show <S%G32>to<s%> his <S%G1166>bondservants<s%> the <S%G846>things<s%> <S%G1401>which<s%> <S%G3739>must<s%> <S%G1163>happen<s%> <S%G1722><s%> <S%G5034>soon.<s%>"

<S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> I come <S%G2064%G99999>quickly<s%>. Blessed is he <S%G3107>who<s%> keeps <S%G3588>the<s%> words <S%G5083>of<s%> the prophecy <S%G3056>of<s%> <S%G4394>this<s%> <S%G5127>book<s%> <S%G975><s%>."

Now <S%G2532>I<s%> <S%G1473><s%>, <S%G2491>John,<s%> am the one who heard <S%G191>and<s%> <S%G2532>saw<s%> these <S%G991%G99999>things<s%>. <S%G2532>When<s%> I <S%G3753>heard<s%> <S%G191>and<s%> <S%G2532>saw<s%> <S%G991><s%>, I fell down to <S%G4098>worship<s%> <S%G4352>before<s%> the feet <S%G1715>of<s%> the angel who had <S%G4228>shown<s%> <S%G32><s%> <S%G1166>me<s%> these <S%G3427%G99999>things<s%>.

He said <S%G2532>to<s%> <S%G3004>me<s%> <S%G3427><s%>, "See you <S%G3708>don<s%> <S%G3361>'t<s%> do <S%G1063>it!<s%> I am <S%G1510>a<s%> fellow bondservant <S%G4675>with<s%> you and <S%G4889>with<s%> <S%G2532>your<s%> <S%G4675%G99999>brothers<s%>, the <S%G4396>prophets,<s%> and with those who keep <S%G2532>the<s%> words <S%G5083>of<s%> <S%G3056>this<s%> <S%G5127>book<s%> <S%G975><s%>. Worship <S%G4352>God<s%> <S%G2316><s%>."

He said <S%G2532>to<s%> <S%G3004>me<s%> <S%G3427><s%>, <S%G3361>"Don't<s%> seal up the words of the <S%G4972>prophecy<s%> <S%G3056>of<s%> <S%G4394>this<s%> <S%G5127>book<s%> <S%G975><s%>, for the <S%G3754>time<s%> <S%G2540>is<s%> at <S%G2076>hand<s%> <S%G1451><s%>.

He who acts <S%G91>unjustly,<s%> let him act unjustly <S%G91%G99999>still<s%>. He who is <S%G2532>filthy<s%> <S%G4510><s%>, let him be filthy <S%G4510%G99999>still<s%>. He who is <S%G2532>righteous<s%> <S%G1342><s%>, let him do righteousness <S%G1344%G99999>still<s%>. He who is <S%G2532%G99999>holy<s%>, let him be holy <S%G37%G99999>still<s%>."

<S%G2532><s%> <S%G2400>"Behold,<s%> I come <S%G2064%G99999>quickly<s%>. <S%G2532>My<s%> <S%G3450>reward<s%> is <S%G3408>with<s%> <S%G3326>me<s%> <S%G1700><s%>, to repay to each <S%G591>man<s%> <S%G1538%G99999><s%> according to <S%G5613>his<s%> <S%G846%G99999>work<s%>.

I <S%G1473>am<s%> the <S%G1510>Alpha<s%> <S%G1>and<s%> the <S%G2532>Omega<s%> <S%G5598><s%>, the First <S%G4413>and<s%> the <S%G2532%G99999>Last<s%>, the Beginning <S%G746>and<s%> the <S%G2532%G99999>End<s%>.

Blessed are those <S%G3107>who<s%> <S%G3588>do<s%> <S%G4160>his<s%> <S%G846>commandments<s%> <S%G1785><s%>, that <S%G2443>they<s%> may have <S%G846>the<s%> <S%G2071>right<s%> <S%G1849>to<s%> the tree <S%G1909>of<s%> <S%G3586>life<s%> <S%G2222><s%>, and may enter in by the <S%G2532>gates<s%> <S%G1525><s%> <S%G4440>into<s%> the <S%G1519>city<s%> <S%G4172><s%>.

Outside are <S%G1161>the<s%> <S%G1854>dogs<s%> <S%G2965><s%>, the <S%G2532>sorcerers<s%> <S%G5333><s%>, the sexually <S%G2532%G99999>immoral<s%>, the <S%G2532>murderers<s%> <S%G5406><s%>, the <S%G2532>idolaters<s%> <S%G1496><s%>, and <S%G2532>everyone<s%> who <S%G3956>loves<s%> <S%G5368>and<s%> <S%G2532>practices<s%> <S%G4160>falsehood<s%> <S%G5579><s%>.

<S%G1473>I,<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus,<s%> have sent <S%G3992>my<s%> <S%G3450>angel<s%> to testify <S%G32>these<s%> things <S%G3140>to<s%> <S%G5023>you<s%> <S%G5213>for<s%> the <S%G1909>assemblies<s%> <S%G1577><s%>. I <S%G1473>am<s%> the <S%G1510>root<s%> <S%G4491>and<s%> the offspring <S%G2532>of<s%> <S%G1085>David<s%> <S%G1138><s%>; the Bright <S%G2986>and<s%> <S%G2532>Morning<s%> <S%G3720>Star<s%> <S%G792><s%>."

The <S%G2532>Spirit<s%> <S%G4151>and<s%> the <S%G2532>bride<s%> <S%G3565%G99999>say<s%>, <S%G2064>"Come!<s%>" He who <S%G2532>hears<s%> <S%G191><s%>, let him <S%G2036>say,<s%> <S%G2064>"Come!<s%>" He who is <S%G2532>thirsty<s%> <S%G1372><s%>, let him <S%G2064>come.<s%> He who <S%G2532%G99999>desires<s%>, let him take the water <S%G2983>of<s%> <S%G5204>life<s%> <S%G2222>freely<s%> <S%G1432><s%>.

I testify <S%G1063>to<s%> everyone <S%G4828>who<s%> hears <S%G3956>the<s%> words <S%G191>of<s%> the prophecy <S%G3056>of<s%> <S%G4394>this<s%> <S%G5127>book<s%> <S%G975><s%>, if <S%G1437>anyone<s%> <S%G5100>adds<s%> <S%G2007>to<s%> <S%G4314%G99999>them<s%>, may God <S%G2316>add<s%> <S%G2007>to<s%> <S%G1909>him<s%> the plagues <S%G846>which<s%> are <S%G4127>written<s%> <S%G1125>in<s%> <S%G1722>this<s%> <S%G5129>book<s%> <S%G975><s%>.

<S%G2532>If<s%> <S%G1437>anyone<s%> takes <S%G5100>away<s%> <S%G851>from<s%> the words <S%G575>of<s%> the book <S%G3056>of<s%> <S%G976>this<s%> <S%G5129>prophecy<s%> <S%G4394><s%>, may God take <S%G2316>away<s%> <S%G851>his<s%> <S%G846>part<s%> <S%G3313>from<s%> the tree <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G976>life<s%> <S%G2222><s%>, and <S%G2532>out<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> the <S%G1537>holy<s%> <S%G40>city<s%> <S%G4172><s%>, which are written <S%G1125>in<s%> <S%G1722>this<s%> <S%G5026>book<s%> <S%G975><s%>.

He who <S%G3588>testifies<s%> these <S%G3140>things<s%> <S%G5023%G99999>says<s%>, <S%G3483>"Yes,<s%> I come <S%G2064%G99999>quickly<s%>." <S%G281>Amen!<s%> <S%G3483>Yes,<s%> <S%G2064>come,<s%> Lord <S%G2962>Jesus<s%> <S%G2424><s%>.
The grace of <S%G5485>the<s%> <S%G2257>Lord<s%> <S%G2962>Jesus<s%> <S%G2424>Christ<s%> be <S%G5547>with<s%> <S%G3326>all<s%> the <S%G3956>saints<s%> <S%G5216><s%>. <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
